Title: Directs the department of environmental conservation to renew certain well permits in a county having a population of two million or more and wholly encompassed by a city, for period of not more than 2 years
Summary: Directs the department of environmental conservation to renew permits for wells which access a sole source aquifer in a county having a population of two million or more and wholly encompassed by a city, for a period of not more than 2 years and subject to certain conditions on the uses thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to direct the department of environmental conservation to renew permits for access and use of certain wells in a county having a population of two million or more and wholly encompassed by a city, for periods of not more than 2 years
